name: ELEX WooCommerce Discount Per Payment Method
author: ELEXtensions

sections.description:
It will be a pleasant little surprise for customers if you offer a discount based on the payment method they have chosen on the Checkout page. The ELEX WooCommerce Discount per Payment Method Plugin allows you to offer discounts on your WooCommerce store based on the payment method chosen by customers.

There are a lot of payment methods available in the industry. Some are preferable for customers, while some are advantageous for merchants. This plugin will help you set up discounts on payment methods, which will help you encourage your customers to choose the advantageous one over other payment options.

Sometimes, you would like to receive the payment through digital payment methods rather than cash on delivery option. In such cases, you can provide discounts based on digital payment methods. Also, do not forget to display those exclusive offers to catch the eyes of customers!

If you are planning to run any special promotion or scheme for a specific payment method in your store, integrating this plugin will be a great idea to make customers choose the respective payment method.

Moreover, discounts will attract potential customers to choose your store over and over. Thereby, increase the sales flow towards your store with this simple, yet robust plugin.

Features

  • Apply Percentage Discount Based on Payment Methods.
  • Apply Discount for the Active Payment Methods in your Store.
  • Customize the Discount Label on Checkout Page.
  • Enable or Disable the Discount at Any Time.
  • Add Discounts for Multiple Payment Methods Together.

ELEX Premium Plugins You May Be Interested In

  • WooCommerce Dynamic Pricing and Discounts Plugin
  • Wholesale & Role Based Pricing
  • WooCommerce Advanced Bulk Edit Products, Prices & Attributes
  • ELEX Hide WooCommerce Shipping Methods
  • ELEX Address Validation & Google Address Autocomplete Plugin for WooCommerce
  • ELEX WooCommerce Shipping Calculator, Purchase Shipping Label & Tracking for Customers
  • WooCommerce Google Shopping Integration

ELEX Services

If you have any custom requirement on ELEX WooCommerce Choose Your Delivery Date, please feel to contact ELEX Development Services explaining your business case.
If you have any queries please contact ELEX support

About ELEXtensions

We, Team ELEXtensions are a group of WordPress and WooCommerce enthusiasts with a vision to solve genuine problems related to WordPress & WooCommerce stores. We offer a wide variety of extensions for WooCommerce. We have premium extensions related to many domains including Shipping, Pricing, Payments and Customer Support.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it ! you can now configure the plugin.

sections.reviews:
Wrong percent

By xhtmlsolutions on March 13, 2024

The plugin works fine except for the main thing: It does the percentage calculation wrong. Please fix the configuration. Thank you so much.

Good Plugin & Amazing Devs

By albenaabigail on January 24, 2024

I recently had an experience with the developer team that truly exceeded my expectations. From the moment I reached out to them with an issue, the team was incredibly responsive and easy to communicate with. Their approach to addressing my concerns was both professional and friendly, making the entire process smooth and stress-free.

What stood out most was the speed at which they resolved the issue. The
team acted swiftly, demonstrating their expertise and commitment to
providing top-notch service. They not only quickly identified the problem
but also implemented an effective solution in no time. Their efficiency was
remarkable, and it was evident that they value their clients' time and
satisfaction.

Moreover, the team was very approachable and open to dialogue. They
listened attentively to my concerns, ensuring that I felt heard and
understood. Their clear and concise communication made it easy to follow
the steps they were taking to resolve the issue, which instilled a great
deal of confidence in their abilities.

In conclusion, the developer team's performance was outstanding. Their
quick response, easy communication, and effective problem-solving skills
truly set them apart. I am thoroughly impressed with the level of service
provided and would highly recommend them to anyone in need of technical support. The team's dedication to their work and their clients is
commendable, and I am grateful for their help in resolving my issue so
efficiently.

Perfect plugin it does what it advertises

By dev42452t23 on June 30, 2023

I created a WordPress account only to post this review, if you are looking to add discounts to payment methods stop looking this is the right plugin for you! Easy simple and straight to the point. Good luck to the developer
